short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for recruiters that uses Chat-GPT to generate targeted outreach messages for a LinkedIn prospect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're a recruiter... 

And you'd rather blast out template messages that no one responds to.

Or...

You prefer to wrack your brain for 22 minutes to write a single, unique email... that your prospect never even opens or replies to.

Then this is NOT for you.

But... 

If you want to be unique...  ðŸ‘€ ... 3 times over.

And send messages that make potential recruits say WOW... and reply.  ðŸ¤“

And help you close more often and consistently...  ðŸ¤©

Then this extension is for YOU.  ðŸ«µ ðŸ«µ ðŸ«µ

And it's so easy your pet cat (or dog) might be able to do this for you while you sip a pina colada on the beach.  ðŸ˜¸

1. Open LinkedIn and navigate to a prospect.
2. Open the extension.
3. Fill in position that you're hiring for and company name.
4. Click generate and wait for ChatGPT to generate 3 different outreach messages.
5. Choose a message and send it to the prospect.
